item.title: Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON Sensing Components detect, measure, analyze, and process various changes that occur on productions sites, such as changes in position, length, height, displacement, and appearance. They also contribute to predicting and preventing future events.

item.title: Fiber Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: With these Separate-amplifier Sensors, the light from the Amplifier is transmitted through a fiber to enable detection in narrow places, other locations with limited access.

item.title: Photoelectric Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Photoelectric Sensors detect photo-optical workpieces. OMRON provides many varieties of Sensor, including diffuse-reflective, through-beam, retro-reflective, and distance-settable Sensors, as well as Sensors with either built-in or separate amplifiers.

item.title: Displacement Sensors / Measurement Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: These Sensors can be used to measure distances and heights. A wide variety of models is available, including Laser Sensors, LED Sensors, Ultrasonic Sensors, Contact Sensors, Eddy Current Sensors, and more.

item.title: Switches - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON provides Basic Switches that operate when objects reach specific locations and Pushbutton Switches operated by people.

item.title: Level Switches - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: These devices equip electrodes to detect liquid levels. They have been widely used in water works and sewers for buildings and housing complexes, industrial facilities and equipment, water treatment plants and sewage treatment facilities, and many other applications.

item.title: Basic Switches - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Basic Switches have a micro contact gap and operate at the specified movement and force using a snap-action mechanism. They are available in models with split contacts, maintained operation, drip-proof specifications, high capacity, and DC current specifications.

item.title: Limit Switches - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Limit Switch are basic switches that have been encased to protect them from external forces, water, oil, and dirt. Many models are available, such as those resistant to head, cold, or corrosion, as well as high-precision models.

item.title: Safety Components - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Safety Components are required for safety countermeasures in equipment and facilities. They are used for shut-out detection of mechanical guards, checking intrusion into hazardous areas, and building safety circuits.

item.title: Safety Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Sensors that detect the presence of operators near hazardous machines of facilitates.<br/>The lineup includes Scanners that use laser light for detection.

item.title: Safety Door Switches - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Safety Door Switches detect when mechanical guards or covers are closed. They are available in models using either mechanical or non-contact detection, and operation with special keys or actuators is possible.

item.title: Safety Limit Switches - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Safety Limit Switches are limit switches equipped with direct opening mechanisms.

item.title: Relays - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Relays are devices making or breaking electric circuits by their output section driven by operational signal, which is triggered by electric input signal controlled by switching devices.

item.title: General Purpose Relays - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON provides General-purpose Relays, I/O Relays, Power Relays, Latching Relays, and Ratchet Relays.

item.title: Terminal Relays - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON's Terminal Relay Series contributes to saving space in control panels. They are ideal for output interfaces.

item.title: I/O Relay Terminals - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: I/O Relay Terminals simplify connecting PLCs and other Controllers and help reduce wiring in control panels. Achieve wiring with one Connecting Cable. Terminals are available for both inputs and outputs.

item.title: Control Components - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Control Components provide ideal control at production site through Counters, Cam Positioners, Timers, Timer Switches, Digital Temperature Controllers, and other input, control, and output components.

item.title: Temperature Controllers - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: These Controllers receive sensor signals and control heaters or other devices to maintain a preset temperature. They can also be used for humidity, pressure, and flowrate control. OMRON also provides temperature and humidity sensors.

item.title: Timers - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON provides a range of Analog Timers and Digital Timers, as well as Time Switches for 24-hour, weekly, or annual time control.

item.title: Counters - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON provides Preset Counters, Totalizing Counters, Time Counters and Electromagnetic Counters.

item.title: Automation Systems - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Automation Systems include Programmable Controllers that support machine control, and Network/Software products to support easy information exchange with host systems.

item.title: Machine Automation Controllers - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: One Machine Control

item.title: Industrial PC Platform - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: The Industrial PC Platform is an integrated range of products designed for use in a variety of industrial applications that will benefit from advanced PC technology.

item.title: Programmable Controllers - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Programmable Logic Controllers, along with easy-to-use Support Software, are available to flexibly handle applications from small-scale equipment to entire production lines with Programmable Logic Controllers such as those in the CJ1, CS1 and other series.

item.title: Motion / Drives - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Servo motors and inverters ideal for positioning, speed and torque controls in various business machine control fields.

item.title: Machine Automation Controllers - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: The NJ-Series Machine Automation Controller is at the heart of the new Sysmac platform.

item.title: Inverters - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON Inverters provide for energy-efficient operation of facilities and machines with fine speed control.<br/>The 3G3MX2 series has a direct connection to the NJ controller via EtherCAT.

item.title: Servomotors / Servo Drivers - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Servomotors and Servo Drivers are provided for the purpose of high-speed, high-precision control.<br/>The G5 series has a direct connection to the NJ controller via EtherCAT.<br/>Customers can design faster, more advanced machine automation control systems.

item.title: Robotics - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Robot arms, robot controllers, and vision systems for flexible production lines.

item.title: Industrial Robots - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Robot arms, robot controllers, and vision systems for flexible production lines.

item.title: Energy Conservation Support / Environment Measure Equipment - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Electric power monitoring equipment for energy conservation support, sensing and control equipment for an environment sensing in the clean room.

item.title: Electric Power Monitoring Equipment - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Power monitoring equipment from portable Power Sensors for simple measurement to high-precision Power Sensors for constand monitoring. Our line-up also includes Power Sensors with earth leakage and momentary voltage drop monitoring.

item.title: EQUO Environment Sensor - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Various sensors which can easily sense a particle at manufacturing site and environmental data of temperature/humidity and difference of pressure are lined up.

item.title: Monitoring / Analyzing Software - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Software monitoring and analyzing measured data, which supports energy conservation and environmental measure.

item.title: Power Supplies / In Addition - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON provides Power Supplies, Protective Components, Wiring Systems, Sockets, DIN Rails, and other components required on manufacturing sites.

item.title: Power Supplies - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON provides many types of general-purpose Power Supplies, such as the type mounted to DIN rail or the type built into equipment. OMRON also provides the S8VS which provides notification of replacement timing, and the Buffer Block that handles momentary power interruptions, and other highly reliable Power Supplies.

item.title: Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Backup power supply equipment for protecting a device or system from problems with power supply caused by power failure or lightning. By introducing a UPS, you can solve problems with power supply that are likely to occur in manufacturing sites such as "voltage drop" and "power failure."

item.title: Axial Fans - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON's complete lineup includes water-resistant AC Axial Fans with superior resistibility to water and dirt, and General-purpose AC Axial Fans.

item.title: S8FS-G Switch Mode Power Supply (15/30/50/100/150/300/600-W Models)/Features | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Switch Mode Power Supply (15/30/50/100/150/300/600-W Models) Superior Basic Performance That Ensures Reliability. Wide Range of Standards Certification and Greater Usability.

item.title: R88M-1[] / R88D-1SN[]-ECT AC Servo System 1S-series/Features | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: AC Servo System 1S-series Optimized installation and setup Increased machine productivity Global availability and global conformance

item.title: eCobra 600 Lite / Standard / Pro SCARA Robots/Features | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: SCARA Robots Mid-size SCARA robot for precision machining, assembly, and material handling

item.description: With Pressure Sensors, changes in pressure can be measured to confirm suction, verify mounting, manage source pressures, and test for leaking. Differential Pressure Flow Sensors are also available.

item.description: Amplifier Units, simple operation and high performance, can select various Fiber Units depending on works and space.

item.description: A lineup of Communications Units for Sensors

item.title: Separate Amplifier - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: With these Photoelectric Sensors, the Amplifier and Sensor Head are separated to enable downsizing and facilitate adjustment.

item.title: Built-in Amplifier - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: With these Photoelectric Sensors, the amplifier is built into the Sensor Head.

item.title: Built-in Power Supply - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: These Photoelectric Sensors help achieve a total cost reduction because a wide AC or DC power supply range can be used.

item.title: Area Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Area Sensors are Multi-beam Through-beam Sensors used to sense wide areas. The detection width of the Sensor can be selected according to the application.

item.title: Accessories - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: A wide range of adjusters to mount Photoelectric Sensors, Covers, Mounting Brackets, Slits, Reflectors, and Hand-held Checkers are available.

item.title: High Precision Measurement Sensor - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Nano-level measurement resolution. Lineup of ultra-compact, white light confocal sensors and long-range-detection laser sensors.

item.title: Displacement Sensors for Differentiation - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Smart Sensors designed to allow anyone to easily use advanced sensing performance. Even with laser, proximity, contact, and other sensing methods, operations are essentially the same.

item.title: Profile Measuring Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: A wide laser beam for 2D sensing of steps, widths, sectional areas, inclinations and other shapes.

item.title: Measurement Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Sensors that detect objects and measure their widths, thicknesses, and other dimensions. Models are available with CCD or laser scanning methods to meet different application and precision needs.

item.title: Other Displacement Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Displacement Sensors that measure distances and heights. A wide variety of models is available, including Laser Sensors, LED Sensors, Ultrasonic Sensors, Contact Sensors, Eddy Current Sensors, and more.

item.title: Vision Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: This package-type Vision Sensor provides both high-end inspection capabilities and excellent processing speed.

item.title: PC Vision System - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: An easily customizable, PC-based image processing system.

item.title: Smart Camera - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: These integrated cameras provide a cost effective solution for a wide range of vision applications.

item.title: Other Vision Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Smart sensors with LCD monitor and high-speed CCD cameras.

item.title: Lighting System - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: A wide variety of more than 200 Lightings for measurement using Vision Sensors.

item.title: Lens - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: A wide range of products allows you to select the optimal Lens for each application.

item.title: Cylindrical - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: These Proximity Sensors use high-frequency oscillation. They resist heat, chemicals, and water better than Rectangular Sensors. They are available in both shielded and unshielded models.

item.title: Rectangular - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: These Proximity Sensors use high-frequency oscillation. There are available in a wide range of sizes to enable selection to match the installation location.

item.title: Separate Amplifier - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: With these Proximity Sensors (high-frequency oscillation), the Amplifier and Sensor Head are separated to enable downsizing and facilitate adjustment.

item.title: Capacitive - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Capacitive Proximity Sensors can be used to detect non-metal objects, such as liquids and plastics.

item.title: Others - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Proximity Sensors are also available for special applications in long-distance models, and slim models are available for use combined with Proximity Sensors.

item.title: Accessories - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON provides Attachments to facilitate mounting, Protective Accessories, and Mounting Brackets.

item.title: Slot-type - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: The emitter and receiver are set in a U shape to enable easy handling.

item.title: Through-beam - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Through-beam Sensors have separate emitters and receivers to enable setting them at the required distance.

item.title: Slot-type / Reflective - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: With Slot-type Sensors, the emitter and receiver are set in a U shape to enable easy handling. With Reflective Sensors, light is shown on the workpiece and reflected light is detected.

item.title: Limited-reflective - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Convergent Reflective Sensors detect workpieces that are only a specific distance from the Sensor. They can be effectively used when there are background objects.

item.title: Diffuse-reflective - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: With Reflective Sensors, light is shown on the workpiece and reflected light is detected.

item.title: Retro-reflective - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: With Retro-reflective Sensors, a Reflector is set and the Sensor detects whether light is reflected back from the Reflector. They are effective for precise, stable detection.

item.title: For Special Applications - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Sensors are also available for special applications.

item.title: Peripheral Devices - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Accessories such as Connecting and Mounting Brackets are also available.

item.title: Incremental - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Incremental Encoders output a pulse string according to the rotational displacement of an axis. The number of rotations can be detected by counting the number of pulses.

item.title: Absolute - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Absolute Encoders output the rotational angle using an absolute code. The rotational position can be detected by reading the code. This eliminates the need to return to the origin at startup.

item.title: Direct Discrimination Unit - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: A Direction Discrimination Unit accepts phase difference signal from the Encoder to detect the direction of rotation. Either voltage or open-collector outputs can be connected.

item.title: Peripheral Devices - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Accessories required by Rotary Encoders are provided, including Couplings, Flanges, and Servo Mounting Brackets.

item.title: Contact Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: Contact Sensors detect objects and measure dimensions with a high accuracy of 1 m. Their strength to withstand the sliding movement and their slim bodies are ideal for use in a wide variety of measurement applications.

item.title: Liquid Leakage Sensors - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: A wide range of Liquid Leakage Sensors such as Sensing Bands, Point Sensors, Chemical-resistance Sensors, and Sensors resistant to high temperatures. They are widely used in semiconductor production equipment and clean rooms.

item.description: These Non-lighted Pushbutton Switches mount in holes with a 10.5-mm diameter. A built-in basic switch provides a sure click feel in operation. The Operation Unit is available in six colors: Blue, black, green, red, white, and yellow.

item.title: Square / Rectangular-body Type - Product Category | OMRON By Kyoto Engineering & Automation
item.description: OMRON also provides these Square Body Pushbutton Switches and Indicators. They are available in many different sizes. Either total surface lighting or partial lighting is possible.

item.description: Plateau-head with Round-body Type Theses flat top Pushbutton Switches are newly introduced. The Switch Unit can be detached from Operation Unit.
